title: Happy Birthday Miss Haley
content:
Unlike [Antartica](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705163302/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41513), your birthday will be warm and sunny all day. Enjoy it!

 [‹ Move Over Phillip Meggs](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705163302/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43599 "Go to previous forum topic") [Childhood lettering ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705163302/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43067 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Asvetic

comments.content:
Happy Birthday!!

Where I am we just had a beautifully white fresh layer of snow last night, so it feels like Antartica. It’s sunny, too, so it’s the best Winter’s day we’ve had this season.

I wanted to comet on your Birthday but didn’t know what to say so...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705163302im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/comet_5849.jpg)

ChrisL
Happy birthday!
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705163302im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hale_6036.gif)
Have a great day Haley!
Happy birthday Haley!

Happy Birthday Haley!

:D
Happy Birthday, Haley!
Happy Birthday!
Happy Birthday, Haley. :-)

Thanks guys!

My little sister told me it’s also rapper Mase’s birthday.

and almost Greek Independence day :-)

ChrisL

Not to forget about [William Morris](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705163302/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/William%252BMorris), [Harry Houdini](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705163302/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Houdini) and [Steve McQueen](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705163302/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_McQueen). [Pretty good company](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705163302/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/24_March#Births), I’d say.

Also [Steve McQueen, Star Jones, and the Undertaker.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705163302/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/March_24#Births)

Happy birthday!
Happy Birthday, Haley!

Happy Birthday!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705163302im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/HF_5447.jpg)
Happy Birthday, Haley!!
Happy birthday, Haley!
I’m new and don’t yet know everyone well, but I hope you don’t mind my wishing you a Happy Birthday, too!
Happy birthday, Haley! Here’s hoping it’s even more than a teaspoon of awesome.
And let’s throw Wilhelm Reich onto this auspicious list.

bon anniversaire haley,

and by the way, there is a quite large and famous electronic stores chain here in istanbul named “Tekno SA”, and they recently issued some gift enveloppes, quite nicely designed, and sporting teaspoon... i thought you’d be happy to learn that.

dr
That’s amazing! Thanks for telling me.

Have a fun-filled, mirthful birthday Haley.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705163302im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/crimson_rose_5144.jpg)

j a m e s
Happy Birthday, Haley!

Hope you had a happiest one!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705163302im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/halley_6578.jpg)

Hi Miss Haley! I don’t know who you are, but!, I love birthday greetings :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705163302im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/haley_6735.gif)

“May the Force be with You!”

I hope your cake was delicious.

...and a happy birthday to the 1/365th of you out there celebrating your birthday today. hurrah.

Maybe that should read, “May the Farce be with you”? :-)

ChrisL
“Hurrah”!
